biography_text: SÁNCHEZ, Linda T.,  (sister of Loretta Sanchez), a Representative from California; born in Orange, Orange County, Calif., January 28, 1969; B.A., University of California, Berkeley, Calif., 1991; J.D., University of California, Los Angeles, Calif., 1995; lawyer, private practice; executive secretary and treasurer of Orange County, Calif., AFL-CIO, 2000-2002; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eighth and to the eight succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2003-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: University of California, Los Angeles, Calif.
